mapper.insert: insert into pay(pay_imp_uid, pay_merchant_uid, pay_pg, pay_method, pay_name, pay_amount, member_num, member_email, member_name, member_phone_num, member_address) value(#{payImpUid}, #{payMerchantUid}, #{payPg}, #{payMethod}, #{payName}, #{payAmount}, #{memberNum}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNum}, #{memberAddress})
